title: 98/369/EC: Commission Decision of 19 May 1998 amending Decision 97/468/EC on drawing up provisional lists of third country establishments from which the Member States authorise imports of wild game meat (notified under document number C(1998) 1375) (Text with EEA relevance)
header:
COMMISSION DECISION of 19 May 1998 amending Decision 97/468/EC on drawing up provisional lists of third country establishments from which the Member States authorise imports of wild game meat (notified under document number C(1998) 1375) (Text with EEA relevance) (98/369/EC)
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body: The Annex to this Decision is added to the Annex of Decision 97/468/EC.
This Decision shall apply from 10 May 1998.
This Decision is addressed to the Member States.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 19 May 1998.
For the Commission
Franz FISCHLER
Member of the Commission
(1) OJ L 243, 11. 10. 1995, p. 17.
(2) OJ L 13, 16. 1. 1997, p. 33.
(3) OJ L 199, 26. 7. 1997, p. 62.
